NT3D_texture_o Class Reference

NT3D_texture_o class This base class provides data independent facilities to manipulate and administrate textures. More...

GLenum dim

Detailed Description

The texture is bound to the object through the CreateTexture() call in the NT3D_texture_o constructor.

General drawing usage in a derived NT3D_object_o class is: Paint() -> DrawXYZ() -> Painted()

Bug:
unknown
Warning:
dim is 2 by default in this base class
